overview:
Adam Heeter is chief executive officer of Oxford Consulting Group. Since joining Oxford in 2003, Heeter has been instrumental in building a professional services organization with over 100 professionals across the United States. With over 10 years of experience in technology and consulting, Heeter manages all Oxford business units and functional disciplines including sales and client delivery. Heeter has played a central role in Oxfordâ€™s dramatic growth.

Under Heeterâ€™s leadership, Oxford has been routinely recognized with high-profile growth and performance awards, including being named the 7th-fastest growing privately held company in central Ohio by Columbus Business First in 2007.

Through Oxford Consulting Group and personally, Heeter supports Franklin County Childrenâ€™s Services, Choices-a not for profit focused on eliminating domestic violence, and The Open Shelter. Heeter holds a B.S. in Business Marketing from the University of Akron.

adam.heeter@oxford-consulting.com
